pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes radio scripts and sound and video recordings documenting the careers of the Johnson Family Singers and Betty Johnson. Includes 158 scripts from WBT shows, Charlotte, NC, 1943-1965, in which the Johnson Family Singers performed and Larry Walker appeared on the Margaret Ann Show.
